SELECT id, total_count, comment FROM vika_code_coupon_template WHERE is_deleted = 0
AND comment LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT vcct.id, vcct.total_count, vcct.comment, vcct.created_at, vcct.updated_at, vu.nick_name AS creator, vu2.nick_name AS updater FROM vika_code_coupon_template vcct LEFT JOIN vika_user vu ON vcct.created_by = vu.id LEFT JOIN vika_user vu2 ON vcct.updated_by = vu2.id WHERE vcct.is_deleted = 0
AND comment LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC
